snippet.title: Mondealy Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Itch.io (download) - https://uglycoal.itch.io/mondealy
Game's Discord - https://discord.gg/FVGcJvefz3

Start on your adventure from an ordinary day to an unexpected finding deep below the surface of your home town Mondealy. 

Exploration, a lot of peculiar and not characters with their own personalities and beautiful graphics - all of this is present in this game and more will be added with time, depending on community support and feedback.
Inspired by Deltarune, Undertale and Stardew Valley, this polished demo is something to look at for fans of previous games and for everyone else, looking for a pleasant 2D adventure game.
